subject: Re: [PATCH v2 0/2] Performant CXL type 3 non-interleaved regions

reviews.author: Alireza development (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Alireza development (author) requested changes to ensure that the fast path is applicable and provided test cases to demonstrate performance improvements.

reviews.author: Gregory Price
reviews.summary: The reviewer, Gregory Price, initially asked for the base-commit of the patchset and had trouble applying it. Later, he tested the patches on top of another branch and found them to work nicely, but also mentioned an unrelated issue with a different patch.

reviews.author: Zhijian (Fujitsu)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Zhijian pointed out two issues: the function signature was not updated to match the new parameter, and requested benchmark data for performance improvement claims.
